Text.Page:
What's going on? First the faeries go mad, now the sporewalkers are thrashing us.

It's like someone's setting all of our allies against us.

I hate to ask, but we have to hold our position. Can you deal with the sporewalkers?

I heard someone mention Thulsa's name. It might well be that he's stirring up trouble against us, trying to keep us distracted.

Thanks to you, we can stay focused. Well fought, .
